text:
Kim Kardashian is making 2018 a yr to recollect.

At present, the Holding Up With the Kardashians star will obtain the first-ever Influencer Award on the Council of Style Designers of America Style Awards, held in New York Metropolis. Though previous honorees of the annual ceremony have been restricted to designers (except the Icon Award, which Rihanna and Beyoncé have acquired in current years), the brand new class demonstrates the style trade’s recognition of the worth of social media. And, Kim’s fashion prowess and relationships with designers are a testomony to that worth.

Her 112 million Instagram followers have grown to know her minimalist costume apparel, translucent heels, tremendous laid again Yeezy favorites—bike shorts, outsized sweatshirts and thong sandals included—and barely-there wardrobe. The KKW Magnificence proprietor’s fashion is standout and recognizable.
title: 8 Times CFDA Honoree Kim Kardashian Stepped Up Her Style Game in 2018
